title.black: Software to increase electrical network capacity without reinforcement

introduction.content: With our software, we support network operators in ensuring low-voltage network security cost-effectively, especially in times of increasing network load and new regulations.

challenges.content: Every day more charging stations, heat pumps and solar systems are connected in our households. The capacity of the low-voltage networks is still sufficient to transport electricity. As the energy transition progresses, bottlenecks will occur more often, which can lead to congestions and even failures.

solution.content: With FION, network operators can actively control the peak loads of the ever-increasing number of consumption and generation systems, prevent bottlenecks and thus increase their network capacity even without network expansion. And all of this without any noticeable restrictions for the system operator.

case.content: With advanced ML algorithms, FION identifies unusual patterns in energy consumption and alerts in case of potential issues such as faulty equipment, tampering, or fraud. FIONs user-friendly platform is easy to integrate with existing systems and can help prevent costly errors, improve efficiency, and increase customer satisfaction.

FIONs AI leverages smart meter data and GIS data to calculate accurate grid loads in real-time, wherever you want, without installation of additional IoT devices. With FION, you can start leveraging load flexibilization and prevent bottlenecks and damages in your low-voltage grid.

FION offers a powerful solution for modern DSOs looking to strategically expand their grid infrastructure. Using cutting-edge analytics and AI, FION can identify the areas with the highest need for infrastructure reinforcement and help DSOs make informed decisions about where to invest their resources.

items.title: Identify congestion
items.content: Determine the affected network section and time based on power flow calculations

items.title: Plan regulation
items.content: Select flexible consumer devices in the congestion area and determine the regulation strength

items.title: Excecute regulation
items.content: Regulation command is transmitted to consumer devices via SMGW and control box signal path

items.title: Document power reduction
items.content: Document the power reduction based on feedback from the consumer devices

benefit.content: Decrease investments in measuring infrastructure and save costs expanding your grid by smarter, real-time data based decision making.
Accelerate manual processes like grid compatibility tests and free up capacity of your workforce, especially important in times of worker shortage.
Make your grid security bulletproof detecting and flagging anomalies related to hacker or fraudulent activity immediately.

items.title: Seamless integration
items.content: FION connects to existing systems such as ERP, GIS and new systems such as SMGA, aEMT and HEMS via flexible interfaces.

items.title: Simple regulation planning
items.content: FION supports regulation planning by bringing together and presenting all relevant information in one system and easy user guidance

items.title: High level of automation
items.content: FION enables complete automation of the regulation process from congestion identification to system control

items.title: High level of data protection
items.content: FION protects sensitive data through a secure software and database architecture in accordance with ISO/IEC 27001/2 standards

items.title: Regulation conformity
items.content: FION covers all requirements of the Federal Network Agency, such as non-discriminatory control execution and documentation

items.title: AI usage
items.content: FION's algorithms enable reliable congestion determination even with low penetration of measuring devices in the low-voltage network

about.title: About us
about.excerpt: We are on a mission to make network operators more successful in the energy transition
about.footnote: FION offers smart software solutions for these challenges that can immediately help distribution network operators. For a more sustainable energy supply.
about.founder:
Philipp and Johannes, the founders of FION Energy, have found themselves as a team driven by one goal.
Accelerating the energy transition to slow climate change.

FION's mission is to use our expertise in data science and software development where it is needed most:
In the low-voltage networks.
about.discussion: After hundreds of hours of discussions with various companies in the energy industry, we kept coming back to problems for distribution network operators that also influence other companies while working on the energy transition.
about.problem: To understand the problem further, we spoke to distribution network operators around Europe. The increasing number of decentralized energy producers and consumers will force companies to monitor and regulate low-voltage networks in real time in the future. To do this, a very large amount of data, which comes from various measuring devices in the network, existing software and external sources such as weather forecasts, must be processed almost in real time.
about.statement: From congestions to long waiting times for connection requests. The distribution networks are in the center of the energy transition, operators are its pace makers.
about.by: Congestion manager of german network operator
